languages.text: "Рад это слышать. Многие на Даргонусе надеются на скорейшие поставки продовольствия в столицу".

traits.locale_text: "Рад это слышать. Многие на Даргонусе надеются на скорейшие поставки продовольствия в столицу".
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "I am delighted to hear it. Many on Dargonus live in hope that food deliveries to the capital will resume soon."
languages.original_text: "Рад это слышать. Многие на Даргонусе надеются на скорейшие поставки продовольствия в столицу".

traits.locale_text: "I am delighted to hear it. Many on Dargonus live in hope that food deliveries to the capital will resume soon."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: "I am delighted to hear it. Many on Dargonus live in hope that food deliveries to the capital will resume soon."

traits.locale_text: "I am delighted to hear it. Many on Dargonus live in hope that food deliveries to the capital will resume soon."

traits.locale_text: "I am delighted to hear it. Many on Dargonus live in hope that food deliveries to the capital will resume soon."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: “我很高兴听到这个消息，达戈努斯许多人都希望食物能早日运送过来。”
languages.original_text: "I am delighted to hear it. Many on Dargonus live in hope that food deliveries to the capital will resume soon."

traits.locale_text: “我很高兴听到这个消息，达戈努斯许多人都希望食物能早日运送过来。”
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: «Me alegra saberlo. Muchos en Dargonus esperan el momento de que se retomen los envíos de comida a la capital».
languages.original_text: "I am delighted to hear it. Many on Dargonus live in hope that food deliveries to the capital will resume soon."

traits.locale_text: «Me alegra saberlo. Muchos en Dargonus esperan el momento de que se retomen los envíos de comida a la capital».
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: 「それは何より。ダルゴヌスの民の多くは、首都への食料配給が近日中に復旧することを願っております」
languages.original_text: "I am delighted to hear it. Many on Dargonus live in hope that food deliveries to the capital will resume soon."

traits.locale_text: 「それは何より。ダルゴヌスの民の多くは、首都への食料配給が近日中に復旧することを願っております」
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Freut mich sehr, das zu hören. Viele auf Dargonus hoffen, dass die Essenslieferungen zur Hauptwelt bald wieder aufgenommen werden."
languages.original_text: "I am delighted to hear it. Many on Dargonus live in hope that food deliveries to the capital will resume soon."

traits.locale_text: "Freut mich sehr, das zu hören. Viele auf Dargonus hoffen, dass die Essenslieferungen zur Hauptwelt bald wieder aufgenommen werden."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: « Je suis ravi de l'apprendre. Les habitants de Dargonus seront soulagés d'apprendre que les livraisons de produits alimentaires reprendront très bientôt. »
languages.original_text: "I am delighted to hear it. Many on Dargonus live in hope that food deliveries to the capital will resume soon."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis ravi de l'apprendre. Les habitants de Dargonus seront soulagés d'apprendre que les livraisons de produits alimentaires reprendront très bientôt. »
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Bunu duyduğuma sevindim. Dargonus'ta birçok kişi, başkente gıda sevkiyatlarının bir an önce yeniden başlamasını umuyor."
languages.original_text: "I am delighted to hear it. Many on Dargonus live in hope that food deliveries to the capital will resume soon."

traits.locale_text: "Bunu duyduğuma sevindim. Dargonus'ta birçok kişi başkente gıda sevkiyatlarının bir an önce devam etmesini umuyor."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor
